page.title: 16TRANSPORT AROUND YARLET.
page.content: Until relatively recently,this area had only one main road running from north to south,the A34,which passes through the eastern side of our zone.But with the vast increases in numbers of vehicles and in their size,the building of the M6 Motorway became necessary.This runs parallel to the A34 though is on the western side of the area.Apart from this,there is only one other main road,though there are a considerable number of lanes joining these roads to the villages and farms. We made two surveys of the traffic on the M6,one on a fine Saturday,the other on a wet Thursday.Both were in the late morning and each was for a quarter of an hour in each direction.The totals show considerable variation and can partly be accounted
